articles.description: The Academy Awards are still months away, but the Oscar race is already heating up. Here's who's leading ("Nomadland") and who's lagging ("Mank").
articles.content:
The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences reveals new criteria that require more diversity for nominees. The rules will go into effect in 2024.
USA TODAY
Strap in for the weirdest Oscar race … [+6670 chars]
